title: I wasted $2644 on Mystery Tech
description: Its time to #CancelMysteryTech. Have you listened to the podcast yet?  Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 2 5G on Amazon:  Ducky Pocket:  Gigabyte M27Q KVM monitor:  I cant find a link to the iPhone water cooler but lets be real you should make better decisions. 8Bitdo SN30 Pro for Xbox / Android on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Our second channel @This Is!  My Twitch channel:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
